svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Global energy consumption by region, measured in terrawatt-hours (TWh). Note that this data includes only
commercially-traded fuels (coal, oil, gas), nuclear and modern renewables used in electricity production. As such, it
does not include traditional biomass sources.
